body: @davecheney  By forcing myself to use the old version of `go vet` - that is, a blank CentOS container, only installing `go` using `wget` - I am able to reproduce the large amounts of error messages that some of the other developers were seeing. Somewhere between the version that shipped with `go1.4.2` and the current `HEAD` there must have been a regression. I am seeing eighty-seven errors and by a quick poll, they all seem legitimate. They are all composite literal errors (unkeyed fields) that do not show up in the new version.
